resources.string: Unknown error
%1$s (Error: %2$s)
Server certificate is invalid.
Internet connection is not available.\n\n Check settings.
No response was received from server.\n\n Try again later.
Cannot connect to server.\n\nTry again later.
Cannot create or use socket.\n\nTry again later.
Unknown host.
Processing of message failed.\n\nTry again later.
Received unexpected response.
You have already registered this gateway.
This gateway has not connected to cloud yet.\n\nPlease check its Internet connection.
This gateway has already been registered by another user.\n\nHe can share gateway with you.
Server experienced some issues.\n\nTry to connect later.
Request to gate timed out. Requested action may not happened.
Request to gate was rejected.
Invalid action was inserted.
Invalid actuator value was inserted.
Bad type of aggregation function was requested.
Your session has expired.\n\nLog in again.
Invalid email or role was inserted.
Invalid icon was inserted.
Invalid interval was inserted.
Invalid location type was inserted.
Wrong password.
Invalid time zone was inserted.

This version of communication protocol is no longer supported.
(application: %1$s, server: %2$s)

Please update your application.
Error when communication with firmware/algorithms.
Sent wrong or damaged message.\n\nTry again.
You already have access to this gateway.
Error when generating access token.
This name or e-mail cannot be utilized.
This password is not safe.
Invalid location type was inserted.
This provider is not available.
This request is not supported by server.
Server reported unknown error.
You have low rights to perform this action.\n\nAsk owner to grant you higher rights.
Bad module ID or type was inserted.
Bad token or e-mail was inserted.
Requested object was not found.\n\nTry again.
Activate your account.
This account is temporary locked.
This user name is not available.
E-mail or username does not exist.
Login provider does not provide e-mail
This e-mail is joined to another provider. Use right provider and add this one in you setting.
Logout failed, try it later.
This feature is still under development.
You can\'t do this.
